Compound S3969, [ N- (2-hydroxyethyl) -4-methyl-2- (4-methyl-1H-indol-3-ylthio) ] pentanamide]Is a small molecule activator of human ENaC. Recently compound S3969 was reported to reversibly stimulate human ENaC in heterologous cell expression systems. The compound acts on ENaC to increase the channel opening rate and apparent affinity (EC)<sub>50</sub>) Was 1 mM.
